attributes.action: Make it compulsory for every public building in the UK to fly the Union flag
attributes.additional_details: To help restore pride in the nation every public building should fly a Union flag all year round. I would like to see the government pass a law to this effect.
attributes.background: I would like to see the government make it compulsory for every public building in the UK to fly the Union flag. Buildings such as schools, hospitals, libraries, council offices, parks, police, fire, and ambulance stations, universities, court buildings, customs buildings, harbour offices etc

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563467
